transcend.4_1_zh:

SKT_FIRST.name: Ticking Clockwork
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of Eva's Max Health.\nActivates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを【エヴァ】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復させる。\n攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>連携</color>を発生させる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 에바 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다.\n가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>협공</color>을 발생시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使生命值最低友军的生命值恢复相当于艾娃生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>。\n使攻击力最高的友军发动<color=#28d9ed>夹攻</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_2.effect: +70 Action Points to Target (Excluding the caster)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nRemoves all debuffs\nIncreases Revival duration by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nすべての弱体効果解除\n蘇生+2ターン
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n모든 약화 효과 해제\n소생 +2턴
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n解除所有弱化效果\n苏醒+2回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Time Dilation
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Cannot be inflicted with Frozen or Silenced.\n(Triggered Effect) When an ally is inflicted with a <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color>, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color>.\nWhen Agile Response is activated, reduces the duration of all <color=#28d9ed>debuff(s)</color> inflicted on allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color> and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Seal Extra Skill</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, and Agile Response cannot activate immediately after using this skill.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)凍結、沈黙の影響を受けない。
(発動効果)味方に<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>がある場合、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。
迅速対応発動時、味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少し、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>追加スキル封印</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
このスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 빙결, 침묵의 영향을 받지 않습니다.
(발동 효과) 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color> 적용 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.
신속대응 발동 시 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시키고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>추가 스킬 봉인</color>을 부여합니다.
이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh:
(被动效果)不受冰冻、沉默的影响。
(触发效果)友军受到<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>时,触发<color=#28d9ed>迅速应对</color>效果。
迅速应对触发时,使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并对全体敌人造成<color=#28d9ed>额外技能封印</color>,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。
此技能发动后,敌人不会触发反击、复仇、迅速应对效果。

3_jp: 弱体効果のターン-1ターン
3_zh: 弱化效果持续时间-1回合
5_jp: 追加スキル封印の強化(効果抵抗 無視)
5_kr: 추가 스킬 봉인 강화 (효과 저항 무시)
5_zh: 附加额外技能封印强化(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Dreaming of You
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> all allies for <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> of Eva's Max Health and increases <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を【エヴァ】の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>回復させ、<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 에바 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>만큼 회복시키고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>속도</color>를 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 使全体友军的<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复相当于艾娃生命值上限的<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>,使<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

5_jp: 味方全体に無敵+1ターン

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>5</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers the <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>13%</color> of Eva's Max Health.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>5</color>のWGを追加でDOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>をエヴァの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>13%</color>回復させる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>5</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 에바 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>13%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:攻击后,使WG额外降低<color=#28d9ed>5</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使生命值最低友军的<color=#28d9ed>生命值</color>恢复相当于艾娃生命值上限的<color=#28d9ed>13%</color> 。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
